name: They're Lost in Space Online Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: No vagrants allowed on the porch.
questions.explanation:
Nova.

	NO VAgrants allowed on the porch. A nova is a star that flares up to several times its original luminosity before reverting to its original brightness. This brightening is believed to occur because of a naturally occurring nuclear explosion on the surface of the star.

questions.text: It works fine, even used repeatedly.
questions.explanation:
Venus.

	It works fine, eVEN USed repeatedly. Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system and the third brightest object in our sky after our sun and moon. It is known for spinning retrograde, and having an atmosphere of carbon dioxide and sulfuric acid.

questions.text: I am going to beg a lax youth to mow my lawn.
questions.explanation:
Galaxy.

	I am going to beG A LAX Youth to mow my lawn. A galaxy is millions of stars, along with their planets, moon, gas, and dust that are held together by gravity. We are part of the Milky Way galaxy and there are thought to be at least 150 billion other galaxies in the universe.

Saturn.

	Who haS A TURNip? Saturn is the sixth planet from the sun and the second largest planet in the Milky Way. This beautiful gas giant is known for its spectacular rings.

questions.text: I found Elmo on my bed.
questions.explanation:
Moon.

	I found ElMO ON my bed. A moon is a natural satellite that orbits around a planet. A planet can have no moons, such as Mercury, or over 50, such as Jupiter.

questions.text: Do you want to come to my house?
questions.explanation:
Comet.

	Do you want to COME To my house? A comet is a celestial body that is often described as a 'dirty snowball'. The ice and dust combine to make a beautiful tail when its orbit takes it near the sun.

questions.text: I sent my llama on a plane to Zambia.
questions.explanation:
Planet.

	I sent my llama on a PLANE To Zambia. A planet is a large heavenly body that orbits around a star. It may or many not have satellites of its own. The Milky Way has eight different planets that vary greatly in size, atmosphere, and composition.

Quasar.

	I want that aQUA SARong. A quasar is an astronomical body with very high luminosity. It is usually found in the centers of some galaxies. They are powered by gas spiraling at a high rate of speed into a black hole.

questions.text: For ionic bonds to occur, you need electrons.
questions.explanation:
Orion.

	FOR IONic bonds to occur you need electrons. Orion is one of the most visible constellations in the night sky. The constellation of Orion has been recognized by numerous cultures around the world and there are depictions of it in a German cave that are over 30,000 years old.

questions.text: What is the best drum brand?
questions.explanation:
Umbra & Thebe.

	What is the best drUM BRAnd? Simply put, an umbra is the area of total darkness that is seen in the shadow caused by an eclipse. The term is also used for the dark central portion of a sunspot.
